useCase.name: Environmental Sampling and Analysis
useCase.description: UAVs collect and analyze water samples from an open body of water.

preconditions.precondition: Multiple UAVs are equipped with water sampling mechanisms (and onboard analytics capabilities if required)

successEndConditions.condition: The samples are collected successfully from the targeted coordinates

failureEndConditions.condition: UAVs fail to collect and/or analyze water samples

useCase.trigger: The UAV operator activates the water sampling mission.

mainSequence.step: Operators dynamically generate flight routes, including sample collection points for the targeted area.
DroneResponse requests and receives flight authorization.
The operator issues a command to start the mission.
The UAVs fly their assigned routes and collect and analyze samples at their assigned collection points.
When a UAV has completed its collection assignment, it returns home.
The operator removes samples and replaces and/or replenishes onboard sampling supplies.
Steps 4-8 are repeated until all needed samples have been collected.
The Drone Commander ends the mission.
